activity.instructions: Complete the conversation. Type the correct word(s) in each blank. Then check your answers.

page.text: A: Where do you work? B: I work (at / on) the General Hospital. I'm a doctor. A: Is the hospital (at / near) Lincoln School? B: No. It's (at / on) Eagle Avenue. It's (next to / between) the park. A: Oh. I live (on / near) the park. Our house is (between / on) Monroe Street. Where do you live? B: I live (in / at) an apartment. It's (between / at) the hospital and the school. What do you do? A: I work (on / in) a bank. I'm a manager. B: Where is the bank? A: (At / In) the big office building (in / around) the corner. B: My friend works there, too. She works (at / on) the eighth floor.
